title: Munger: Corona attacked team arriving to sample suspects
content:
People attacked the police team in Munger and Katihar districts on Wednesday. While the team arrived in Munger to collect samples of suspects from Corona, the police patrol vehicle was attacked by villagers in Katihar.

 

The Quick Response Team reached Hazratganj Bada in the city of Munger was stopped by anti-social elements. On receiving the information, Kasim Bazar police reached the spot, such elements started throwing stones at the police and ambulance. Police patrol vehicle was damaged in this. But the case was controlled with the help of the police. Explain that on receiving information from some people who came from outside in the district, Quick Response Team reached Hazratganj Barra.

 

Qasim Bazar police station chief Shailesh Kumar said that police was pelted by anti-social elements. The vehicle was damaged in this. At the same time, the villagers attacked a police patrol vehicle in Nunihaji Tola village in Kamehar. SI Anil Kumar said that when the police went to convince the villagers who got out of the lockdown, they attacked them with brick and stone and sticks.

 

source: https://www.livehindustan.com/bihar/story-attacked-on-poice-team-arriving-to-take-corona-suspects-sample-in-munger-villagers-attacked-a-police-patrol- vehicle-in-katihar-3123372.html

recommendations.title: China sold the PPEs it got as a donation from Italy to Italy: Report
Stones pelted on doctors in Indore while tracking a man who came in contact with COVID-19 patient.
recommendations.content:
Indore: Stones were pelted on a team of health officials while they were trying to trace a person who had come into contact with a COVID-19 patient earlier.
The incident occurred in Taat Patti Bakhal area when the team of five was trying to find out the whereabouts of the person.

recommendations.title: Chamki fever in Corona's havoc, first patient found in Bihar
recommendations.content:
New Delhi. Right now, where Coronavirus has created panic all over the country, the knock of Chamki Fever has further increased the problem of people. Its first case has been reported in Muzaffarpur, Bihar. A child is said to have been admitted to the hospital due to chlamydia fever.
